name: locallyjs
description: Locally is a localStorage manager that supports expirable values with TTL and saves space by compressing them using LZW algorithm.
author: Ozan Tunca <ozan@ozantunca.org> (http://www.ozantunca.org/)

scripts.test: mocha test/node-mocha.js; mocha test/node-mocha.js --mode=dist; mocha test/node-mocha.js --mode=distmin; mocha test/node-mocha.js --mode=light;
scripts.build: cp src/locally.js dist/locally.js; browserify src/locally.js -t babelify -o dist/locally.combined.js -s 'locallyjs'; uglifyjs dist/locally.combined.js -o dist/locally.min.js; rm dist/locally.combined.js; browserify src/light.js -t babelify -o dist/locally-light.js -s 'locallyjs'; uglifyjs dist/locally-light.js -o dist/light.min.js; rm dist/locally-light.js;
